column1: The Pit Room////I'm definitely a fan of the Pit Room.  The brisket is moist and tender and all of the delicious sides compliment the meats perfectly.  It's a small and cozy place inside
column2: but I was surprised that they were actually connected to the bar next door.  So not only can you order some delicious BBQ
column3: but you can eat it at the bar next door which also has a nice patio deck.  Nothing better than BBQ and drinks!
